I checked into the Grand Mercure Hotel in Seoul on 4/16/2025. I have been traveling all over Korea for a few weeks now and one of the requirements for choosing the hotel was the washer and dryer. I was extremely disappointed that the hotel did not have a dryer. I have many clothes that I need to wash and dry for my travels and this washer and dryer combo didn’t dry my clothes instead of enjoying my travel, I am now hanging my clothes all over the places in my room to dry. In my opinion, the Hotel Grand Mercure has falsely advertised and people like me have to suffer the consequences. Who wants to do laundry manually during your vacation?  In addition, there are no instructions on the washer/ dryer. ( just the translation )and most of the staff have no idea about the machine?!?!?! I have to be here for 15 more days. If they offer me a full refund, I would gladly move to another hotel with a real washer and a dryer! Unless you want to hang your set clothes all over the room, this hotel is not for you!   접기
